law.catch_line: Administrative regulations for the implementation of KRS 304.17A-640 et seq.
law.text: The commissioner shall promulgate administrative regulations necessary to implement the provisions of KRS 304.17A-640, 304.17A-641, 304.17A-643, 304.17A-645, and 304.17A-647.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1246, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 24, effective July 14, 2000.
